title: Building a Home
storyDescription: A family works together to build a beautiful home, learning about the importance of a safe and blessed place to live.

mixedSegments.text: Long ago, a righteous family wanted to build ٱلْبَيْتِ (the House) where they could live in peace and worship Allah.
The father said, 'Let us find a good مَكَانًا (a place) where our بُيُوتِكُمْ (your houses) will be blessed by Allah.'
They searched through ٱلْمَدِينَةِ (the city) and ٱلْبِلَٰدِ (the land) to find the perfect spot for their home.
The mother reminded them, 'Allah commands us to make our بُيُوتِ (houses) places of prayer and remembrance.'
They built their home with love, and it became a مَـَٔابٍ (place of return) for all good people in the community.
Every day, they thanked Allah for their beautiful home and shared their blessings with their neighbors.

title: The Path to a Good Home
storyDescription: A traveler learns that the straight path leads to a blessed home and eternal gardens.

mixedSegments.text: A wise traveler asked, 'Which صِرَٰطٍ (a path) should I take to find a blessed home?'
The guide answered, 'صِرَٰطٌ (the path) that is straight leads to the best destination. Follow صِرَٰطِ (the Path) of those who have earned Allah's pleasure.'
The traveler walked on ٱلْبَرِّ (the land) through valleys and hills, always keeping his heart pure.
At night, he looked up at ٱلسَّمَآءُ (the heavens) and prayed for guidance on his journey.
He finally reached his destination, where the earth was like a soft ٱلْمِهَادُ (resting-place) for the righteous.
The traveler learned that those who follow the straight path will find eternal peace in their final home.

title: The Heavens Above
storyDescription: A child looks up at the sky and learns about Allah's magnificent creation of the heavens.

mixedSegments.text: Little Amina sat outside her home and gazed up at ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ (the heavens) in wonder.
She asked her grandfather, 'Who created ٱلسَّمَآءُ (the heavens) so beautifully?'
Her grandfather smiled and recited, 'وَٱلسَّمَآءِ (By the heaven) and all that it contains, Allah is the Creator of everything.'
He explained, 'Allah created ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ (the heavens) in seven layers, each with its own purpose and beauty.'
Amina felt small but special, knowing that Allah who created the vast sky also created her heart.
From that day, every time she looked up, she remembered Allah's greatness and said Alhamdulillah.

title: The Beautiful Gardens
storyDescription: A family visits beautiful gardens and learns about the gardens of Paradise promised to the believers.

mixedSegments.text: The family walked through جَنَّٰتٍ (Gardens) filled with colorful flowers and tall trees.
The father said, 'These gardens are beautiful, but Allah has promised believers جَنَّٰتُ (Gardens) even more wonderful in Paradise.'
They sat near a river flowing through جَنَّٰتِ (Gardens) and enjoyed the peaceful sounds of nature.
The mother told them, 'In Paradise, there will be جَنَّٰتٌ (Gardens) beneath which rivers flow, and no one will ever feel tired or sad there.'
The children picked flowers and imagined what the eternal gardens would be like for those who do good deeds.
They went home grateful, hoping to be among those who will enter the gardens of Paradise.
